00037 /// writes data samples from a single rectangular region 
00038 class RegionSlice : public MSDataAnalyzer
00039 {
00040     public:
00041 
00042     struct Config : public RegionAnalyzer::Config
00043     {
00044         Config(const std::string& args); 
00045     };
00046 
00047     RegionSlice(const MSDataCache& cache, const Config& config);
00048 
00049     /// \name MSDataAnalyzer interface
00050     //@{
00051     virtual void open(const DataInfo& dataInfo);
00052 
00053     virtual UpdateRequest updateRequested(const DataInfo& dataInfo,
00054                                           const SpectrumIdentity& spectrumIdentity) const;
00055 
00056     virtual void update(const DataInfo& dataInfo, 
00057                         const Spectrum& spectrum);
00058 
00059     virtual void close(const DataInfo& dataInfo);
00060     //@}
00061 
00062     private:
00063     const MSDataCache& cache_;
00064     boost::shared_ptr<RegionAnalyzer> regionAnalyzer_;
00065 };
00066 
00067 
00068 template<>
00069 struct analyzer_strings<RegionSlice>
00070 {
00071     static const char* id() {return "slice";}
00072     static const char* description() {return "write data from a rectangular region";}
00073     static const char* argsFormat() {return "[mz=[a,b]] [rt=[a,b]] [index=[a,b]] [sn=[a,b]]";}
00074     static std::vector<std::string> argsUsage()
00075     {
00076         std::vector<std::string> result;
00077         result.push_back("mz=[a,b] (set m/z range)");
00078         result.push_back("rt=[a,b] (set retention time range)");
00079         result.push_back("index=[a,b] (set spectrum index range)");
00080         result.push_back("sn=[a,b] (set scan number range)");
00081         return result;
00082     }
00083 };
